achievements: Starred in iconic film franchises like Star Wars and Indiana Jones.
Known for his rugged persona and action-hero roles.
Widely considered one of the most successful actors of all time.
One of the most influential and acclaimed directors in American cinema.
Known for his Westerns and historical epics.

First person to assume the presidency without being elected president or vice-president.
